Summary: Great low-carb option for Asian noodle dishes
text:
Love this product! I'm committed to a low-carb lifestyle and find it easy most of the time. However, there was one carb I missed; Asian noodle dishes, like pad thai. I got the angel-hair sized noodles, and they look like rice noodles, and come packaged in a liquid filled bag. I was surprised by the weight of the shipping box. They are made from plant fiber so no calories, carbs, sugar, wheat, etc. Crazy impossible, right?
I used these in a chicken dish with a spicy sauce, and they were really enjoyable, not funky, and cured my Asian noodle craving. The consistency is very similar to "al dente" rice noodles in pad thai.
So if you are watching carbs, calorie, sugar, gluten, etc. and are looking for a pasta alternative, check them out.
